alert.note: Alert for Black Hawk; Bremer; Butler; Grundy (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 2:08PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Black Hawk, Bremer, northern Grundy and southeastern Butler Counties through 300 PM CST... At 208 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Grundy Center, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Dike around 215 PM CST. Hudson and Uni-Dome And McLeod Center around 225 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Cedar Falls, Waterloo Municipal Airport, Denver and Tripoli. This includes Interstate 380 near mile marker 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for central Iowa.
